prompt: Can you tell me about the dinosaurs?
completion: Of course! Dinosaurs were amazing giant reptiles that lived a very, very long time ago. Some, like the huge Brachiosaurus, were gentle giants that only ate plants. Others, like the famous Tyrannosaurus Rex (T-Rex!), were mighty hunters with big teeth. They all disappeared a long time ago, but we can still find their bones, called fossils, to learn about them!
